text.content:
Shield Crash

You deal the attack's normal damage to your shield, applying Hardness.

Melee

Everything you Got

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued].

Ranged

Hard-edged Adversary

You take @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage or @Damage[2d6[slashing]] damage (determined by the GM).

Unarmed

You made 'em Tougher

The target gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: Resistance 5 to all damage]{Resistance 5 to all damage} until the start of its next turn.

Spell
